description:
Azuma Rin is a fifteen years old Jiang Shi (reanimated corpse) who recently moved to the city. Due to being constantly bullied by her human classmates during childhood, she loathed humans until being saved by Akina. She now works in a noodle store. When she was a child she was hunted by humans until she met http://anidb.net/ch20472 [Zakuro] who became her first friend.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Azuma Rin
